title: C# Interview Questions Quiz
description: Test your knowledge of C# programming concepts

questions.question: What is C#?
options: A type-safe, object-oriented language used to create .Net applications with a component-oriented approach
A scripting language for web development only

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a key feature of C#?
What are classes in C#?
options: A concept or blueprint to define how data will be structured, stored, and managed within a program

questions.question: What are objects in C#?
options: Class instances that can represent characteristics of real-world entities

questions.question: Which class type cannot be used to create objects directly and requires inheritance?
Which access modifier makes members accessible from anywhere in the code?
What is the first step in compiling C# code?
options: Compile source code into a managed module

questions.question: What is the difference between 'break' and 'continue' statements?
options: Break exits the loop/switch, continue skips to next iteration
Continue exits the loop, break skips to next iteration
Break is for loops only, continue is for switches only

questions.question: Which keyword is used to throw an exception in C#?
What are the two accessors in C#?
Which symbol is used for single-line comments in C#?
What are static declared variables in C#?
options: Variables shared by all instances of a class with the same value

questions.question: What is the difference between Value Types and Reference Types?
options: Value types store data directly, Reference types store a reference to data location
Reference types store data directly, Value types store a reference

questions.question: What are namespaces used for in C#?
options: Organizing code and separating code that may use the same names

questions.question: Why would you implement the 'using' statement in C#?
options: To manage and automatically release resources once an object has finished processing

questions.question: What's the main difference between Dispose() and Finalize()?
options: Dispose() guarantees garbage collection, Finalize() does not
Dispose() is automatic, Finalize() is manual

questions.question: What is boxing in C#?
options: Converting Reference Type to Value Type
Converting Value Type to Reference Type

questions.question: Which parameter type stores the memory address within the method argument?
How do you declare a nullable integer in C#?
What are constructors in C#?
options: Special functions that share the class name and are called when creating objects
